::Ice::

She growled,"Not a chance Lunarpine. I'm with you on this one, like it or 
not."

She stared at Megaton as he attacked.  She used her mind to send the message 
to him, she focused her thoughts to make him see the ground he was on turn 
to molten lava.  The closer he came to Ice and Lunarpine, the more intense 
the image got.  She focus all her energy into this deadly image for Megaton 
to see.



----------original message---------
>Lunarpine growled at Megaton as the bigger mutant approached. "Get back
>inside Ice." he snarled not willing to risk both of them. "Get some backup"
>the wolf stepped back and started to crouch his back legs.
>
>Megaton looked toward Ice smiling, he was amused that these two were 
>willing
>to fight him. "You do know the difference between heros and fools Yes?" He
>again transformed to his Dragon mode looking down on the others as if they
>were mere toys, "Fools don't survive."
>
>Lunarpine had had enough talk and lunged forward at the giant before him.
>Much like the toy he appeared to be he was swatted aside by Megatons
>enormous claw.
>
